short_summary: Construct Building H-102 Communication and Information Technology Building
description: The work includes, but is not necessarily limited to, the supply of labour, material, supervision and equipment necessary to construct a 1,175 m2 new single storey building to house communications and information technology. Building comprised of cross laminated timber structure for the exterior walls and roof. The siteworks for the new facility includes parking and fire access, diesel fired emergency generator and mechanical and electrical site servicing.
duration_in_months: For the whole duration of the contract, which will therefore be 42 and 609 calendar days
